notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Species distribution data for all terrestrial mammals were downloaded from http://www.iucnredlist.org/technical-documents/spatial-data; the authors selected only mammals present in the Brazilian Amazon. This proceed is described in “Species data” in the Material and Methods section. Climate data were downloaded from http://www.worldclim.org/version1. Data on Protected Areas were downloaded from http://mapas.mma.gov.br/i3geo/datadownload.htm; the authors selected 'Areas Especiais', then 'Unidades de Conservação' and downloaded data from federal, state, and municipal levels.
